subject: message "null"
msgSnippet: Hi all, question: is there a reason that fail() produces an AssertionError with message null -- i had expected null (you know: getMessage() == null rather
messageBody:
Hi all,

question:
is there a reason that fail() produces an AssertionError with message
"null" -- i had expected null (you know: getMessage() == null rather
than getMessage.equals("null)).

greetings

Ernst
